title: Will any of the legacy teemo skins (happy elf, little devil, badger, recon) be re-released?
body: Asking riot employees will you ever re release any of the legacy teemo skins for example this Halloween will little devil be re released and happy elf at Christmas?

replies.body: There's no guarantee atm, but a lot of those event skins do typically pop up around the event time in the next year.
wait so there will not be halloween sales this year? :(
